Title.evidence: Randomised Controlled Trial of a Chlorogenic Acid–Strontium-Loaded Bioresorbable eStent for Vein Graft Restenosis Prevention

Intervention.evidence: assigned to either the SrCA eStent group or a control group with non-stented vein grafts

Method_Outcome.evidence: The primary outcome was neointimal thickness reduction at 4 weeks.

Randomisation_Allocation.evidence: Randomisation was computer-generated, and allocation was concealed.

Blinding.evidence: Blinding was applied to outcome assessors.

Result_Outcome.evidence: mean difference = 0.15 mm, 95% CI 0.10 to 0.20; p < 0.01
